name: Inter font
description: The Inter font (specifically the Medium variant) is used as the primary font of this app

name: Hipparcos stars catalogue
description: The Hipparcos catalogue was used to get a list of sufficiently many stars and information about them

name: Simbad data
description: In addition to the Hipparcos catalogue, data from Simbad were used to get the name (Vega, ...), Bayer designation (alf Lyr, ...), and Flamsteed designation (3 Lyr, ...) for each of the stars

name: Temperature to colour conversion table
description: The table is used to choose a colour for a star based on its temperature (which is in turn calculated from its B-V index using the Ballesteros' formula)

name: spherical_geometry
description: A spherical geometry library developed for this project

name: eframe and egui_extras
description: The UI of this app is built using mostly egui (extended by the functionality in the egui_extras library) with eframe
copyright_notice: Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner] (From the MIT license: Copyright (c) 2018-2021 Emil Ernerfeldt <emil.ernerfeldt@gmail.com>)

name: egui-notify
description: A library for in-app 'notification' pop-ups

name: nalgebra
description: A linear algebra library

name: angle
description: A library for handling angles in a safer manner, making use of type checking to prevent usage of x° as x rad

name: chrono
description: A library for handling dates and time

name: csv
description: A library for parsing CSV data

name: directories-next
description: A library providing locations to store data at for different platforms
copyright_notice: Not found (From the MIT license: Copyright (c) 2018 directories-rs contributors)

name: dotenvy
description: A library for loading environment variables

name: image
description: A library for handling images

name: include_dir
description: A library for embedding folders of files into executables.

name: jni
description: A library for communicating with the Java Interface from Rust (used for the Android builds)
copyright_notice: Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner] (From the MIT license: Copyright (c) 2016 Prevoty, Inc. and jni-rs contributors)

name: ndk-context
description: A library for accessing the Android API
copyright_notice: Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner] (Not fonud in the MIT license)

name: log
description: A generic library for logging things into the console
copyright_notice: Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner] (From the MIT license: Copyright (c) 2014 The Rust Project Developers)

name: android_logger
description: A library for logging things into the console on Android

name: env_logger
description: A library for logging things into the console outside of Android

name: once_cell
description: A library for storing global constant data evaluated at runtime

name: pollster
description: A library for synchronously waiting for asynchronous tasks

name: reqwest
description: A library for making HTTP(S) (web) requests

name: rfd
description: A library that brings out the file dialogue (used for desktop builds)

name: serde_json
description: Library for parsing JSON data

name: serde
description: Library for making parsing data easier

name: tokio
description: A library for asynchronous tasks

name: winit
description: A library to create windows, used for the Android app.
